state.description: This property can be used to update the running status of an un-managed application (i.e. running in *passive mode*). For DIALServer-managed applications this property shall be considered *read-only*.

errors.description: Specified application is running in *active mode*

start.summary: Signals that application launch (or show if previously hidden) was requested over DIAL
start.description: This event is sent out only for un-managed applications (i.e. in *passive mode*).

stop.summary: Signals that application stop was requested over DIAL
stop.description: This event is sent out only for un-managed applications (i.e. in *passive mode*).

hide.summary: Signals that application hide was requested over DIAL
hide.description: This event is sent out only for un-managed applications (i.e. in *passive mode*).

show.summary: Signals that application show was requested over DIAL
show.description: This event is sent out only for un-managed applications (i.e. in *passive mode*).

change.summary: Signals that application URL change was requested over DIAL
change.description: This event is sent out only for un-managed applications (i.e. in *passive mode*).
